div.bibl: The Reform Advocate, wk. of May 15, 1897. p. 212. [HOME FOR THE AGED]

body.p: The sixth annual meeting of the Home for Aged Jews was held on Sunday afternoon, May 9, at the Home. The report of the board of directors showed that the institution contained 54 inmates. As the capacity of the Home is 60 inmates, the report advised the building of an annex, for which $10,000 must be raised. For the first time there was a deficiency in current expenses.
